patthana23.30:1.1: Namahaggataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā mahaggato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana23.30:2.1: Namahaggataṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.30:3.1: Naparittaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
